title: How to Properly Dispose of COVID-19 Vaccine Waste
description: As the United States ramps up COVID-19 vaccine administration, questions are beginning to rise about how to properly dispose of SARS-CoV-2 mRNA vaccine remnants. Although disposal protocols may vary slightly from state to state, BWS, in collaboration with the Healthcare Waste Institute, has developed general guidelines below for COVID vaccine waste disposal. In general, disposal of SARS-CoV-2 mRNA vaccine-related wastes should follow similar processes for other vaccine-related wastes.
cleaned_text: We provide an outstanding value and service to our regulated waste customers and pride ourselves on our 100% customer satisfaction with 99% customer retention ratio.
